string.value: Looking for the Korean Folk Town...
Apparently, Camila of Henesys lost something...

She was devastated that her friend, who lives far from here, sent her a letter, only to be stolen by the notorious Curse Eye's. She was crying as she asked me for help. I may have to find the letter for the sake of Camila, but where is that girl?\n\n#t4031239# #b#c4031239##k/1
I recovered Camila's letter that had been stolen from the Curse Eye's. It should be fun writing letters to people far from me...
어쩌면 좋지? 중요한 편지를 잃어버렸어요. 숲에 사는 심술궂은 커즈아이들이 내 편지를 가져가버렸어. 그 편지는 먼 마을에 사는 펜팔친구가 보내 준 소중한 편지인데.. 이젠 어쩌지? 커즈아이들이 가져 간 제 편지를 찾아와 주세요. 흑흑..

What should I do? I lost a very important letter. A menacing group of Curse Eyes from the forest got a hold of it! It's an important letter written to me by a pen pal from far way. What should I do? Please help me get the letter back from those coward Curse Eyes! (cries)
Thank you so much. I'll be here waiting for your good news~
Man... What am I going to do now...?
Hey, you found my letter!!! Thank you so much! I thought I'd never live to see the day...
Is it really difficult to find that letter?
